h: Why Choose EvoHome for Your Renovation?

1.p: We offer comprehensive renovation services starting from €500/m², ensuring excellent value for money.

2.p: With over 17 years of experience in renovation, our team of professionals is ready to bring any vision to life.

3.p: We provide a 3-year warranty on every completed project, ensuring your full satisfaction and peace of mind.

4.p: We operate in Rome and its beautiful surroundings, offering a wide range of services with a personalized approach.

5.p: Payment is made only after the work is completed, guaranteeing your total satisfaction.

6.p: We offer the possibility of interest-free installments to make financing your project easier.

7.p: Each agreement is backed by an official contract, ensuring transparency and safety at every stage of the process.
